instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Press Start 2P' from Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Force DARK MODE. There is no light mode for this game.
3. COMPONENTS: Do not use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'pixelated' aesthetic defined in visual_enhancers.
4. GAME ENGINE: Use HTML5 Canvas for the 'Arena' page. Keep it simple (2D sprites, basic physics).
5. NAVIGATION: Create a 'Retro Navbar' that looks like a game HUD.
6. DATA: Use the 'game_data' object to populate the Character Select and Shop screens.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, cards, inputs).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold, use high contrast.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, prefer solid pixel borders for this specific project.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (or in this case, retro-pixel styles) with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
